The photo was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and was shared more than 1,400 times before being deleted.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image translates to English as "The latest hotel built by Yoshitha in Deniyaya. Now do you understand why they are cutting down Sinharaja to build that road?"
The caption of the Facebook post: translated from Sinhala to English, states "Carlton Deniyaya. Our efficient veteran built a hotel in Deniyaya."
A reverse image search on Google found t: Indonesia, as well as on a listing for the Bali resort on Agoda, a popular travel website.
